LanguageData.SetPodLauncherTargetFuelLevel: Set target fuel level to {0}\nMax distance: {1} tiles
LanguageData.CaravanDaysOfFoodRot: Days of food: {0}, rot in {1} days
LanguageData.AllCaravanMembersMentalBreak: Stopped because: everyone has a mental break.
LanguageData.ForceExitAndRemoveMapCountdownTip: Your colonists will automatically reform a caravan and leave this area after {0} hours.
LanguageData.ClickToSortByThisColumn: Click to sort by this column.
LanguageData.WorkPriorityShiftClickTip: Shift + click: Increase priority\nShift + right click: Decrease priority
LanguageData.WorkPriorityShiftClickEnableDisableTip: Shift + click: Enable all\nShift + right click: Disable all
LanguageData.AllowedAreaShiftClickTip: Shift + click: Set all to home\nShift + right click: Set all to unrestricted
LanguageData.CheckboxShiftClickTip: Shift + click: Check all\nShift + right click: Uncheck all
LanguageData.CannotOrderNonControlled: Ei voi antaa määräyksiä hallitsemattomille yksiköille.
LanguageData.HostilityReponseTip: Change how to react to nearby enemies when the colonist is not drafted.
LanguageData.ShowLearningHelperWhenEmptyToggleButton: Toggle visibility of the learning helper when it is empty.\n\nThe learning helper is always visible if there is a concept activated to be learned. This toggle makes it disappear when no concept is active.
LanguageData.ShowColonistBarToggleButton: Toggle colonist bar.\n\nDisplays icons and basic status for all colonists along the top of the screen.
LanguageData.AutoHomeAreaToggleButton: Laajenna kotialuetta automaattisesti uusien rakennusten ympärille.
LanguageData.CategorizedResourceReadoutToggleButton: Aseta luokiteltu materiaalivalikko päälle tai pois.
LanguageData.ShowAnimalNamesToggleButton: Aseta päälle kesyjen eläinten nimien näyttäminen.
LanguageData.LockNorthUpToggleButton: Lock the rotation of the camera so the north pole is always up.
LanguageData.GameConditionsTip: Special conditions affecting the area right now.
LanguageData.NoStuffsToBuildWith: Sinulla ei ole sopivaa materiaalia tämän rakentamiseen.
LanguageData.MustPlaceHeadOnShipBeam: Pitää asettaa siten että pääty on aluksen rakennepalkissa kiinni.
LanguageData.MustPlaceNextToHopperAccepter: Pitää asettaa jonkin viereen joka vaatii täyttösuppilon.
LanguageData.MustPlaceCoolerWithFreeSpaces: Jäähdyttimen sekä kuuman että kylmän sivun on oltava näkyvillä.
LanguageData.MustPlaceVentWithFreeSpaces: Molemmat puolet on oltava paljaana ilman läpi pääsemiseksi.
LanguageData.MustPlaceAdjacentStandable: Täytyy asettaa sellaiseen paikkaan jossa on tilaa seisoa joka puolella.
LanguageData.MustPlaceNearFuelingPort: Must be placed next to a pod launcher's fueling port.
LanguageData.CasketWarning: Varoitus!\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] on sinun viimeinen vapaana oleva yhdyskuntalainen! Jos annat hänen astua arkkuun, et voi välttämättä jatkaa pelaamista. Haluatko varmasti jatkaa?
LanguageData.NeurotrainerUsed: {0} käytti älykkyysvalmentajaa ja pääsi taidossa {1} tasolta {2} tasolle {3}.
LanguageData.Title: Nimike
LanguageData.QualityDescription: Esineen laatu kuvaa sitä miten hyvin se on tehty.
LanguageData.GameOverEveryoneDead: Kaikki ovat joko kuolleet tai poissa. Tämä tarina on ohi.\n\nEhkä joku toinen voi hyödyntää näitä raunioita.
LanguageData.GameOverPlanetkillerImpact:
At near-lightspeed, the planetkiller weapon slammed into the ground with the force of a trillion hydrogen bombs. Like a water balloon shot with a rifle, this world liquified under the impact and sprayed its molten guts across the cosmos.

Part of {0} is now a small asteroid belt. The rest is a molten, radioactive hellscape, constantly rippling with kilometers-high planetquakes.

You did not survive.
LanguageData.GameOverArrivedAtJourneyDestination:
As you get on board the ship you are greeted by the crew with open arms. They seem to be glad they could take at least one more person with them.

These colonists escaped:

{0}
These colonists were left behind:

{1}
The AI will now try to guide the ship to a safe place. It might find a prosperous planet for you in this system. Or, it may undertake a centuries-long journey to another star. It might even decide to hide under ice on an asteroid for a few thousand years, waiting for someone to build a new glitterworld here.

As you enter the cryptosleep pod you hesitate for a moment and feel slightly uncertain about whether you can trust these people.

You'll find out when you wake up.
LanguageData.DeterioratingDueToLackOfMaintenance: Deteriorating due to lack of maintenance.
LanguageData.CompassTip: Shows the north direction. Click to rotate the camera so the north pole is up.
LanguageData.RoutePlannerButtonTip: Click to enter the planning mode where you can plan your journey and calculate distance between waypoints.
LanguageData.RoutePlannerUsingAverageTicksPerMoveWarn: Planning mode uses the default caravan speed. Your speed may vary.
LanguageData.RoutePlannerPressEscapeToReturnToCaravan: ESC: Return to the caravan formation dialog.
LanguageData.CaravanMemberMentalBreak: Stopped because: {0} has a mental break.
LanguageData.ShowEnvironmentToggleButton: Toggle the environment display.\n\nDisplays the beauty and room stats of the environment as would be perceived by a character standing where the mouse is pointing.
LanguageData.ExpandingIconsToggleButton: Toggle displaying expanding icons instead of the regular icons for distant objects.
LanguageData.EstimatedTimeToThisWaypointFromPrevious: Est. time between this and the previous waypoint: {0}
